channel.title: Project fubergen v8.3.2
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2hgfvjr.png[/img] Well, new and the best project fubergen client is here now for all [my opinion] Note: this is not bluurs based client, Original Base: ricscape v8.5 ofc client is OPEN SOURCE
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2d0nwi8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2hn2nv8.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Features:[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- All skillcapes, except hunter [*]- New loading and connection lost bar [*]- Jframe with menu [*]- Music in client (u can put your favorite music) [*]- New Hairstyles and clothes. [*]- Nonrenamed with 377 cache [*]- Fixed Prayer bug (freezed client, not enough) [*]- Port and ip Changer in menu [*]- Screenshot button [*]- Vengeance works [*]- More options for themes from client's icon [*]- Note:Choosing different themes? Just click Fubergen's icon [*]- All Previous version's features are in this version too [*]- new hp bar [*]- Chat filter [*]- Reshape minimap [Square] [*]- Edited sprites [*]- Client tells, when update available [*]- music menu deleted, Music buttons added [*]- Custom crowns [*]- Scrollbar fixed [*]- Renamed Gui [*]- 3rd armours [*]- All God's swords [*]- Lots of custom items, recolored items[/ul]
[QUOTE] Latest new in v4.2[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Added fully working client's loader [*]- Stopmenu fixed...very simple [*]- System.exit thing removed [*]- Unzipper [*]- Updated music player [*]- Updated Gui.java[/ul]
[QUOTE]Latest new in v4.3 beta[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Updated Chatbox frame [*]- fixed some sprites [*]- New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing)[/ul]
[QUOTE]Latest new in v4.3[not gonna release][/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Some Bug fixed [*]- deleted some unneeded things[/ul]
[QUOTE]Latest new in v4.4[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Added New Admin Crown [*]- Theme changer from v1.2 (Recustomized) [*]- ZOOMER [added back] [*]- Interface add-on: Buy 20 (Thx for Reaper) [*]- Updater in jmenu now [*]- Some prites from 4.2 [*]- Added noclip to jmenu, lol [*]- FileUpdater works now - Update From jmenu [*] [B][U]Explaining lil.[/U][/B] Fileupdater is new update for fubergen client that tells, [*] "if" theres new java/class files,etc for download and it tells the name of file[/ul]
[QUOTE]Latest New in v5[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Server Pinger [*]- Added Favourite servers menu[/ul]
[QUOTE]Latest New in v6[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Special thanks for Danno [*]- Ingame Hp Changer [*]- More Modern Add Models system [*]- Lots of features in Extra jmenu [*]- New gameframe with wings :d [*]- All updaters removed! [*]- Cursor[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in V7 Alpha[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- 474 Gameframe [*]- Theres some new prayers [*]- Clickable buttons working [*]- Option tab working [474] [*]- Emote tab working [474] [*]- Equipment stat works [ you must modify in server side] [*]- buy "x" working [you mustmodify in server side] [*]- Log out door works [*]- Orb filling works [*]- Autotalker in client [thanks for bluur] [*]- Color changer [thanks for bluur] [*]- run orb isin't 100% perfect but works [*]- Clan chat [*]- New cursors [i fixed lil to make it work front of the jframe ] ( thanks for cocoa ) [*]- "add all models" added to jframe menu[/ul]
[QUOTE] fixed in v7.1 Beta[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Minimapclickarea fixed [*]- Custom crown thing fixed [no dc, when speaking by mod/admin] [*]- Some news models by SilentCJ and Galkon, im too lazy to make list of them, just check class8 [100% creds for them] [*]- Its in rar, not in msi. In next version, i might put it again to a msi.[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v7.2 [Xmas Edition][/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Toolbar with new features [moveable] [*]- New hitmarks [changeable sprite] [*]- New mapmarker [ Changeable sprite] [*]- Cross is back [changeable sprite] [*]-Cooler Background [*]-Old music buttons removed [*]- Its in msi [windows installer]
[*][B]Note: [/B]to make work clan chat, option tab, prayers etc, you must configure them in [B]server side[/B][/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v7.3 [started developing with runelife.com] [/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Some toolbar updates like switch button
[*]- we have made the client compatible with deltascape items.[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v7.4[/QUOTE]
[ul][*] - Fixed some uneened models [*]- Some bug fixed[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in PK Edition [/QUOTE]
[ul][*][configuration updates for server]
[*]- All Godsword's specials with saradomin sword special [*]- Vengeance with pink skull [*]- Some sprites changed [*]- Darkbow special fixed [*]- Default Text colour is changed to Cyan[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in PK Edition [Dan updated client] [/QUOTE]
[ul][*]- Fixed models[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.1[/QUOTE]
[ul][*]music in client~~ Avenged sevenfold - unholy confessions~~
[*]- Open source as always [*]- Lines should not be as messy than in previous releases in gui.java [*]- jtabbedpane with own icon/close button = thx webber for idea [*]- Protection from melee/skull fixed , to use in your server, you need modify skull [*]- icon to 1 and melee 64 [*]- Includes most delta's client items = thx delta [*]- Hp above head checkbox is now back [changeable at startup] [*]- Jtoolbar thing changed, so it wont take whole menu. [floating] [*]- Base for make your own serverinfo text to jtab's textareas [loads from .txt] [*]- Map fix = thx bluur [*]- Some new Custom sprites [items kept on death] thx for google' member who make that [*]- Jtabbedpane fix, at startup, jtabbeds will also change to default theme, not looking like default ugly frame. [*]- default theme loads by static void main in gui.[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.1[/QUOTE]
[ul][*] Fixs - by globe aka daniel[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.2[/QUOTE]
[ul]- hood fixed for female - Colored mask fixed for female - Elite black armours - Some sprite changes - Default theme changed[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.2.1[/QUOTE]
[ul]- Some Sprite updates - Default text color changed. - Default theme changed. using now more stable theme. - Cleaned Old auto-updater shit from client.java - Removed uneened void shits from client.java - Some modifications in gui.java[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.3[/QUOTE]
[ul]- v5 updater - some jframe updates - more stable than v8.2.1! - Some gui edits[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.3.1[/QUOTE]
[ul]- Cache fixed, no more godwar objects replacing shits - Donator sign works, also others can see, if using this client/or added the fix, that i posted - Default chat color changed to cyan - Some method fixs. - class46 replaced with v5's class46 - Cross sprite disabled, uses original now - Some sprite changes[/ul]
[QUOTE]News in v8.3.1[/QUOTE]
[ul]- More jframe commands, some cheat - New runescape menu - thx for him who released - More jframe themes - Skyload - thx r-s - Some sprite changes again - More jtoolbar commands - And alot more.
note: xlog works on most delta servers, i know the fix :), but im not telling that, ofc the 2nd way is to use log out command[/ul]
[CENTER]DOWNLOAD [URL=http://www.fileshost.com/download.php?id=53C89FD71]V8.3.2[/URL]
cleaned version of this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383921.0.html
now for credits lulz
[b]Credits: [/b] Fubergen[me] lol, Galkon Bluurs Webber = for jtabbedpane idea [ note: i didnt use his tab methods] Dan aka pur3pkftw SilentCJ for new d plate Ricscape client v8.5's factors Background created byIPhoenix Java tutorial from java! Globe for helping Cocoa Pennzoil Aka stepehi Enurscape For server's selection codes [I modified it for my client ] Danno - Most New jframe features from dannos client [i just non renamed them and modified for my client]
Client base PF v6 Original Base: ricscape v8.5
[/CENTER]

item.title: Project fubergen v8.3.2
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

[quote=“caelan, post:19, topic:290215”]When i startup the client it comes up with the unknown error client from…
this is the part of GUI that glitches… Where it says “Update Client,Reload Client” I changed because i tried many things to fix it. Im just a beginner coder.

        if(abyte0 != null)
            {
                break;
            }
            String s2 = "Unknown error";
            method13(k, (byte)4, "Update Client, Reload Client.");
            //method13(k, (byte)4, (new StringBuilder()).append("Requesting ").append(s).toString());
            Object obj = null;[/quote]
« on: July 22, 2009, 05:49:54 AM »

Just one word… “Idiot :palm:”

Read full topic

When i startup the client it comes up with the unknown error client from…
this is the part of GUI that glitches… Where it says “Update Client,Reload Client” I changed because i tried many things to fix it. Im just a beginner coder.

        if(abyte0 != null)
            {
                break;
            }
            String s2 = "Unknown error";
            method13(k, (byte)4, "Update Client, Reload Client.");
            //method13(k, (byte)4, (new StringBuilder()).append("Requesting ").append(s).toString());

item.title: Project fubergen v8.3.2
item.dc:creator: @Sir_roju Sir roju
item.description:
@Sir_roju wrote:


Well, new and the best project fubergen client is here now for all [my opinion]
Note: this is not bluurs based client, Original Base: ricscape v8.5
ofc client is OPEN SOURCE

Features:

[ul][]- All skillcapes, except hunter
[]- New loading and connection lost bar
[]- Jframe with menu
[]- Music in client (u can put your favorite music)
[]- New Hairstyles and clothes.
[]- Nonrenamed with 377 cache
[]- Fixed Prayer bug (freezed client, not enough)
[]- Port and ip Changer in menu
[]- Screenshot button
[]- Vengeance works
[]- More options for themes from client’s icon
[]- Note:Choosing different themes? Just click Fubergen’s icon
[]- All Previous version’s features are in this version too
[]- new hp bar
[]- Chat filter
[]- Reshape minimap [Square]
[]- Edited sprites
[]- Client tells, when update available
[]- music menu deleted, Music buttons added
[]- Custom crowns
[]- Scrollbar fixed
[]- Renamed Gui
[]- 3rd armours
[]- All God’s swords
[*]- Lots of custom items, recolored items[/ul]

[QUOTE]
Latest new in v4.2[/QUOTE]

[ul][]- Added fully working client’s loader
[]- Stopmenu fixed…very simple
[]- System.exit thing removed
[]- Unzipper
[]- Updated music player
[]- Updated Gui.java[/ul]

Latest new in v4.3 beta

[ul][]- Updated Chatbox frame
[]- fixed some sprites
[*]- New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing)[/ul]

Latest new in v4.3[not gonna release]

[ul][]- Some Bug fixed
[]- deleted some unneeded things[/ul]

Latest new in v4.4

[ul][]- Added New Admin Crown
[]- Theme changer from v1.2 (Recustomized)
[]- ZOOMER [added back]
[]- Interface add-on: Buy 20 (Thx for Reaper)
[]- Updater in jmenu now
[]- Some prites from 4.2
[]- Added noclip to jmenu, lol
[]- FileUpdater works now - Update From jmenu
[] Explaining lil. Fileupdater is new update for fubergen client that tells,
[] “if” theres new java/class files,etc for download and it tells the name of file[/ul]

Latest New in v5

[ul][]- Server Pinger
[]- Added Favourite servers menu[/ul]

Latest New in v6

[ul][]- Special thanks for Danno
[]- Ingame Hp Changer
[]- More Modern Add Models system
[]- Lots of features in Extra jmenu
[]- New gameframe with wings :d
[]- All updaters removed!
[*]- Cursor[/ul]

News in V7 Alpha

[ul][]- 474 Gameframe
[]- Theres some new prayers
[]- Clickable buttons working
[]- Option tab working [474]
[]- Emote tab working [474]
[]- Equipment stat works [ you must modify in server side]
[]- buy “x” working [you mustmodify in server side]
[]- Log out door works
[]- Orb filling works
[]- Autotalker in client [thanks for bluur]
[]- Color changer [thanks for bluur]
[]- run orb isin’t 100% perfect but works
[]- Clan chat
[]- New cursors [i fixed lil to make it work front of the jframe ] ( thanks for cocoa )
[*]- “add all models” added to jframe menu[/ul]

[QUOTE]
fixed in v7.1 Beta[/QUOTE]

[ul][]- Minimapclickarea fixed
[]- Custom crown thing fixed [no dc, when speaking by mod/admin]
[]- Some news models by SilentCJ and Galkon, im too lazy to make list of them, just check class8 [100% creds for them]
[]- Its in rar, not in msi. In next version, i might put it again to a msi.[/ul]

News in v7.2 [Xmas Edition]

[ul][]- Toolbar with new features [moveable]
[]- New hitmarks [changeable sprite]
[]- New mapmarker [ Changeable sprite]
[]- Cross is back [changeable sprite]
[]-Cooler Background
[]-Old music buttons removed
[*]- Its in msi [windows installer]

[*]Note: to make work clan chat, option tab, prayers etc, you must configure them in server side[/ul]

News in v7.3 [started developing with runelife.com]

[ul][*]- Some toolbar updates like switch button

[*]- we have made the client compatible with deltascape items.[/ul]

News in v7.4

[ul][] - Fixed some uneened models
[]- Some bug fixed[/ul]

News in PK Edition

[ul][*][configuration updates for server]

[]- All Godsword’s specials with saradomin sword special
[]- Vengeance with pink skull
[]- Some sprites changed
[]- Darkbow special fixed
[*]- Default Text colour is changed to Cyan[/ul]

News in PK Edition [Dan updated client]

[ul][*]- Fixed models[/ul]

News in v8.1

[ul][*]music in client~~ Avenged sevenfold - unholy confessions~~

[]- Open source as always
[]- Lines should not be as messy than in previous releases in gui.java
[]- jtabbedpane with own icon/close button = thx webber for idea
[]- Protection from melee/skull fixed , to use in your server, you need modify skull
[]- icon to 1 and melee 64
[]- Includes most delta’s client items = thx delta
[]- Hp above head checkbox is now back [changeable at startup]
[]- Jtoolbar thing changed, so it wont take whole menu. [floating]
[]- Base for make your own serverinfo text to jtab’s textareas [loads from .txt]
[]- Map fix = thx bluur
[]- Some new Custom sprites [items kept on death] thx for google’ member who make that
[]- Jtabbedpane fix, at startup, jtabbeds will also change to default theme, not looking like
default ugly frame.
[*]- default theme loads by static void main in gui.[/ul]

News in v8.1

[ul][*] Fixs - by globe aka daniel[/ul]

News in v8.2

[ul]- hood fixed for female

  • Colored mask fixed for female
  • Elite black armours
  • Some sprite changes
  • Default theme changed[/ul]

News in v8.2.1

[ul]- Some Sprite updates

  • Default text color changed.
  • Default theme changed. using now more stable theme.
  • Cleaned Old auto-updater shit from client.java
  • Removed uneened void shits from client.java
  • Some modifications in gui.java[/ul]

News in v8.3

[ul]- v5 updater

  • some jframe updates
  • more stable than v8.2.1!
  • Some gui edits[/ul]

News in v8.3.1

[ul]- Cache fixed, no more godwar objects replacing shits

  • Donator sign works, also others can see, if using this client/or added the fix, that i posted
  • Default chat color changed to cyan
  • Some method fixs.
  • class46 replaced with v5’s class46
  • Cross sprite disabled, uses original now
  • Some sprite changes[/ul]

News in v8.3.1

[ul]- More jframe commands, some cheat

  • New runescape menu - thx for him who released
  • More jframe themes
  • Skyload - thx r-s
  • Some sprite changes again
  • More jtoolbar commands
  • And alot more.

note: xlog works on most delta servers, i know the fix :), but im not telling that, ofc the 2nd way is to use log out command[/ul]

[CENTER]DOWNLOAD
V8.3.2

cleaned version of this
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383921.0.html

now for credits lulz

Credits:

Fubergen[me] lol,
Galkon
Bluurs
Webber = for jtabbedpane idea [ note: i didnt use his tab methods]
Dan aka pur3pkftw
SilentCJ for new d plate
Ricscape client v8.5’s factors
Background created byIPhoenix
Java tutorial from java!
Globe for helping
Cocoa
Pennzoil Aka stepehi
Enurscape For server’s selection codes [I modified it for my client ]
Danno - Most New jframe features from dannos client [i just non renamed them and modified for my client]

Client base PF v6
Original Base: ricscape v8.5

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
